blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

summary: Never Been a Liar (I'm a Lilac)
title: Never Been a Liar (I'm a Lilac)
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ICkKO1

by ilymoon

Based on the Hades/Persephone myth Dan is the God of Death that has a obsession with lilacs that are given to him by God of Nature Phil and Dan always gets what he wants.

blog.name: quercussp
blog.title: Just an oak tree
blog.description: 25, human flop. Ocassionaly NSFW. This is mostly a phan blog. I have a biology side blog @natureisweird. List of my fics on ao3. Masterlist of my fics and rec lists on Tumblr.

summary: i’m not blaming anyone. i just see people tearing almost everything he does apart and i think he’s sick of it. i would be sick...
question: i’m not blaming anyone. i just see people tearing almost everything he does apart and i think he’s sick of it. i would be sick of it. maybe i’ve got it wrong but my intention wasn’t to blame anyone. sorry for upsetting you
answer: it’s ok anon, you’re entitled to your feelings. but i don’t agree that the phandom “tears everything dan does apart”. i think dan is one of the luckiest people on the platform in terms of his audience. criticism is ok, people have their opinions and not everyone will like everything a creator produces, but dan’s audience is some of the most engaged and loving audiences. every single creator who has ever created has had people not like something that they do. that’s ok. that’s normal. dan needs to know what appeals to his audience and what doesn’t to please his audience. being just blindly supportive of everything he does is ok if that’s what you want to do, but it’s not the only way of being a fan.

reblog.comment: it’s ok anon, you’re entitled to your feelings. but i don’t agree that the phandom “tears everything dan does apart”. i think dan is one of the luckiest people on the platform in terms of his audience. criticism is ok, people have their opinions and not everyone will like everything a creator produces, but dan’s audience is some of the most engaged and loving audiences. every single creator who has ever created has had people not like something that they do. that’s ok. that’s normal. dan needs to know what appeals to his audience and what doesn’t to please his audience. being just blindly supportive of everything he does is ok if that’s what you want to do, but it’s not the only way of being a fan.

trail.content_raw: it’s ok anon, you’re entitled to your feelings. but i don’t agree that the phandom “tears everything dan does apart”. i think dan is one of the luckiest people on the platform in terms of his audience. criticism is ok, people have their opinions and not everyone will like everything a creator produces, but dan’s audience is some of the most engaged and loving audiences. every single creator who has ever created has had people not like something that they do. that’s ok. that’s normal. dan needs to know what appeals to his audience and what doesn’t to please his audience. being just blindly supportive of everything he does is ok if that’s what you want to do, but it’s not the only way of being a fan.
trail.content: it’s ok anon, you’re entitled to your feelings. but i don’t agree that the phandom “tears everything dan does apart”. i think dan is one of the luckiest people on the platform in terms of his audience. criticism is ok, people have their opinions and not everyone will like everything a creator produces, but dan’s audience is some of the most engaged and loving audiences. every single creator who has ever created has had people not like something that they do. that’s ok. that’s normal. dan needs to know what appeals to his audience and what doesn’t to please his audience. being just blindly supportive of everything he does is ok if that’s what you want to do, but it’s not the only way of being a fan.

tags: that is definitely a pet peeve of mine
blaming engaged and emotional audiences for something like this
summary: kind of bothers me how people assume dan doesn’t care about us. i think he feels things much deeper than he tends to let on. i...
question: kind of bothers me how people assume dan doesn’t care about us. i think he feels things much deeper than he tends to let on. i think he’s currently gone for a multitude of reasons, but a big reason is how the phandom treats him
answer: and how does the phandom treat dan that makes him leave? loves him? waits for months for content? buys his merch? goes to his shows? defends him against the slightest criticism? you can do whatever you want, but i will not contribute to any form of blaming adoring fans for dan’s lack of communication.

reblog.comment: and how does the phandom treat dan that makes him leave? loves him? waits for months for content? buys his merch? goes to his shows? defends him against the slightest criticism? you can do whatever you want, but i will not contribute to any form of blaming adoring fans for dan’s lack of communication.

trail.content_raw: and how does the phandom treat dan that makes him leave? loves him? waits for months for content? buys his merch? goes to his shows? defends him against the slightest criticism? you can do whatever you want, but i will not contribute to any form of blaming adoring fans for dan’s lack of communication.
trail.content: and how does the phandom treat dan that makes him leave? loves him? waits for months for content? buys his merch? goes to his shows? defends him against the slightest criticism? you can do whatever you want, but i will not contribute to any form of blaming adoring fans for dan’s lack of communication.

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Making Out (3) Masterlist
body:
part one, part two

30 Kisses for 30 Years - gorgeousdan

Summary: It’s Phil’s thirtieth birthday and Dan is determined to give him thirty kisses. Meanwhile, Phil’s been having domestic thoughts.

Apple - anonymous

Summary: Dan eats an apple. Phil can’t help himself. (loosely based off of that one really old Daniel Howell video, Cringe Attack, except here, they’re high schoolers.)

Asexual (ao3) - Misha_with_wings

Summary: Phil struggles with his anxiety disorder, his asexuality, his issues with contact, and with being comfortable around his boyfriend Dan.

Brat (ao3) - Misha_with_wings

Summary: Dan is a sassy little brat and he’s such a tease.

So Phil decides to put Dan back in his place, that place being on his knees.

Come Undone - avatarin3d

Summary: Dan and Phil’s first night together.

Damn Howell - chocolatesaucelester

Summary: Parties and hookups were never really Phil’s thing, but when he gets the opportunity to spend the night in the popular Dan Howell’s bed, he can’t really complain.

Danger - gorgeousdan

Summary: Dan sits next to Phil in English Literature and Phil’s in love. One day, Dan confides in Phil that he has a crush on a boy who sits in the front and is, in Dan’s words, dangerous.

Easter Baking (ao3) - deathclassic

Summary: Dan and Phil make out for nearly 2 hours while waiting for the Easter nests to chill.

Give the People What They Want (ao3) - aroseintheimpala

Summary: the one where Dan and Phil try to do the chapstick challenge and it doesn’t exactly go as planned.

Let Me Show You Everything I Know (Lapdance 101) - chocolatesaucelester

Summary: Dan challenges Phil to a lapdance and things get a little bit more heated than anticipated.

Short Skirts and Candy Kisses (ao3) - tahliaisnotonfire

Summary: The boy had chestnut coloured hair and matching brown eyes, golden skin and pink succulent lips. His cheekbones were strongly put together and his jawline was at the perfect angle, complementing the boy’s features nicely. Phil couldn’t believe someone like this actually existed. The boy was young and his appearance seemed even more tempting as he was sucking on a lollipop. A fucking lollipop.

Also known as that AU where Phil works in a library and Dan wanders in one day wearing a short skirt looking for a book and Phil just can’t stay low-key.

Simmer Down and Pucker Up - chocolatesaucelester

Summary: Months of pent up emotion come bubbling to the surface when Dan and Phil get locked in a closet.

Since We Came Here Together (ao3) - kay_okay

Summary: “Happy birthday, Dan.”

Dan feels the words come out of Phil’s mouth, and he reaches to pull it against his own again, and again, and again. He loses track of time and vaguely, in some far-away, rational corner of his muddled mind thinks they’ve both been away from the group too long.

“Get me out of here,” he breaks apart and begs, warm and insistent into Phil’s open mouth.

Take It Slow - chocolatesaucelester

Summary: A fluffy and smutty oneshot about Dan and Phil’s first time.

The Great Colin Conundrum - gorgeousdan

Summary: Dan’s boyfriend breaks up with him, and Phil does his very best to get Dan to realize they’re perfect for each other. Unfortunately, Dan’s oblivious and his dog, Colin, is out to ruin Phil’s plans.

The Greatest Gift (ao3) - deathclassic

Summary: Dan and Phil spend Phil’s birthday with his family and Dan really didn’t expect this to happen.

The One Where Dan Finds Phil’s Tinder - gorgeousdan

Summary: Dan finds Phil’s Tinder and finds out Phil’s into guys. Which is - ya know - a game changer. But he can’t just come out and ask if Phil’s into him. So he flirts.

The one with the ripped jeans (ao3) - thelesterhowells

Summary: Phil wears ripped jeans for the first time in public and Dan likes it a lot.

Who You Are And Who You’ve Been (ao3) - kay_okay

Summary: The last day of summer seems like the perfect time to break into a public pool and make life-altering decisions in the middle of the night.

Yes, Chef (ao3) - letspartyrightnow

Summary: Dan is really into his cooking lessons. And other things.

reblog.comment:
part one, part two

Summary: It’s Phil’s thirtieth birthday and Dan is determined to give him thirty kisses. Meanwhile, Phil’s been having domestic thoughts.

Dan feels the words come out of Phil’s mouth, and he reaches to pull it against his own again, and again, and again. He loses track of time and vaguely, in some far-away, rational corner of his muddled mind thinks they’ve both been away from the group too long.

“Get me out of here,” he breaks apart and begs, warm and insistent into Phil’s open mouth.

Take It Slow - chocolatesaucelester

Summary: A fluffy and smutty oneshot about Dan and Phil’s first time.

The Great Colin Conundrum - gorgeousdan

Summary: Dan’s boyfriend breaks up with him, and Phil does his very best to get Dan to realize they’re perfect for each other. Unfortunately, Dan’s oblivious and his dog, Colin, is out to ruin Phil’s plans.

The Greatest Gift (ao3) - deathclassic

Summary: Dan and Phil spend Phil’s birthday with his family and Dan really didn’t expect this to happen.

The One Where Dan Finds Phil’s Tinder - gorgeousdan

Summary: Dan finds Phil’s Tinder and finds out Phil’s into guys. Which is - ya know - a game changer. But he can’t just come out and ask if Phil’s into him. So he flirts.

The one with the ripped jeans (ao3) - thelesterhowells

Summary: Phil wears ripped jeans for the first time in public and Dan likes it a lot.

Who You Are And Who You’ve Been (ao3) - kay_okay

Summary: The last day of summer seems like the perfect time to break into a public pool and make life-altering decisions in the middle of the night.

Yes, Chef (ao3) - letspartyrightnow

Summary: Dan is really into his cooking lessons. And other things.

trail.content_raw:
part one, part two

30 Kisses for 30 Years - gorgeousdan

Summary: It’s Phil’s thirtieth birthday and Dan is determined to give him thirty kisses. Meanwhile, Phil’s been having domestic thoughts.

Apple - anonymous

Summary: Dan eats an apple. Phil can’t help himself. (loosely based off of that one really old Daniel Howell video, Cringe Attack, except here, they’re high schoolers.)

Asexual (ao3) - Misha_with_wings

Summary: Phil struggles with his anxiety disorder, his asexuality, his issues with contact, and with being comfortable around his boyfriend Dan.

Brat (ao3) - Misha_with_wings

Summary: Dan is a sassy little brat and he’s such a tease.

So Phil decides to put Dan back in his place, that place being on his knees.

Come Undone - avatarin3d

Summary: Dan and Phil’s first night together.

Damn Howell - chocolatesaucelester

Summary: Parties and hookups were never really Phil’s thing, but when he gets the opportunity to spend the night in the popular Dan Howell’s bed, he can’t really complain.

Danger - gorgeousdan

Summary: Dan sits next to Phil in English Literature and Phil’s in love. One day, Dan confides in Phil that he has a crush on a boy who sits in the front and is, in Dan’s words, dangerous.

Easter Baking (ao3) - deathclassic

Summary: Dan and Phil make out for nearly 2 hours while waiting for the Easter nests to chill.

Give the People What They Want (ao3) - aroseintheimpala

Summary: the one where Dan and Phil try to do the chapstick challenge and it doesn’t exactly go as planned.

Let Me Show You Everything I Know (Lapdance 101) - chocolatesaucelester

Summary: Dan challenges Phil to a lapdance and things get a little bit more heated than anticipated.

Short Skirts and Candy Kisses (ao3) - tahliaisnotonfire

Summary: The boy had chestnut coloured hair and matching brown eyes, golden skin and pink succulent lips. His cheekbones were strongly put together and his jawline was at the perfect angle, complementing the boy’s features nicely. Phil couldn’t believe someone like this actually existed. The boy was young and his appearance seemed even more tempting as he was sucking on a lollipop. A fucking lollipop.

Also known as that AU where Phil works in a library and Dan wanders in one day wearing a short skirt looking for a book and Phil just can’t stay low-key.

Simmer Down and Pucker Up - chocolatesaucelester

Summary: Months of pent up emotion come bubbling to the surface when Dan and Phil get locked in a closet.

blog.name: quercussp
blog.title: Just an oak tree
blog.description: 25, human flop. Ocassionaly NSFW. This is mostly a phan blog. I have a biology side blog @natureisweird. List of my fics on ao3. Masterlist of my fics and rec lists on Tumblr.

tags: i have mixed feelings about all of this
like i don't particularly care as much as i would a year ago
and i'm glad to have some phil content
but i am also annoyed and bitchy today
summary: same, i feel like dan is just loving not givijg us any updates about him. and its pissing me off as well, we are his audience....
question: same, i feel like dan is just loving not givijg us any updates about him. and its pissing me off as well, we are his audience. we love him like actually and to me it literally feels like he doesnt care u know idk.
answer:
i’m sure he does care. i’m sure it’s just his way of processing things. i’m sure he doesn’t mean to annoy me or you. 

doesn’t stop me from being annoyed though:)

just to ease the overall negativity, here’s a cute gif:
